configurations.select_config: SELECT ck.CONFIG_KEY, ck.CONFIG_VALUE from NODO4_CFG.CONFIGURATION_KEYS ck
configurations.update_config: UPDATE NODO4_CFG.CONFIGURATION_KEYS s SET s.CONFIG_VALUE = 'value' WHERE s.CONFIG_KEY = 'key'

NewMod3.payment_status: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE NOTICE_ID ='$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'

NewMod3.position_payment_status_1: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activatePaymentNotice1.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode' AND s.PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$activatePaymentNotice1Response.paymentToken'

NewMod3.rpt: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV = '$iuv' AND CCP= '$activatePaymentNoticeResponse.paymentToken' AND IDENT_DOMINIO= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.rt_versamenti: SELECT columns FROM table_name s JOIN RT r on s.FK_RT=r.ID  WHERE r.IUV = '$iuv' AND r.CCP= '$activatePaymentNoticeResponse.paymentToken' AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.rpt_versamenti: SELECT columns FROM table_name s join RPT r on s.fk_rpt=r.id where r.IUV = '$iuv' AND r.CCP= '$activatePaymentNoticeResponse.paymentToken' AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.psp: SELECT columns FROM table_name where ID_PSP = '$activatePaymentNotice.idPSP'

NewMod3.position_payment_plan: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE NOTICE_ID ='$activatePaymentNotice.noticeNumber' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'

NewMod3.stati_rpt: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.IUV = '$iuv' and s.ID_DOMINIO= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'
NewMod3.rpt_id: SELECT columns FROM table_name  where IUV = '$iuv' and IDENT_DOMINIO= '$activatePaymentNotice.fiscalCode'

NewMod3.idempotency_act: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IDEMPOTENCY_KEY = '$activatePaymentNotice.idempotencyKey'

NewMod3.idempotency_cache_psp_2: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IDEMPOTENCY_KEY = '$activatePaymentNotice2.idempotencyKey' AND PSP_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice2.idPSP'

NewMod3.idempotency_cache_paymentToken1: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IDEMPOTENCY_KEY = '$activatePaymentNotice1.idempotencyKey' AND PSP_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice1.idPSP' AND TOKEN = '$activatePaymentNotice1Response.paymentToken'
NewMod3.idempotency_cache_paymentToken2: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IDEMPOTENCY_KEY = '$activatePaymentNotice2.idempotencyKey' AND PSP_ID = '$activatePaymentNotice2.idPSP' AND TOKEN = '$activatePaymentNotice2Response.paymentToken'

AppIO.payment_status: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode'
AppIO.payment_status_old: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='002$iuv' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$nodoInviaRPT.identificativoDominio'
AppIO.position_subject: SELECT columns FROM POSITION_SERVICE ps RIGHT JOIN table_name ps2 ON ps.DEBTOR_ID = ps2.ID WHERE ps.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode' AND  ps.NOTICE_ID = '$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber'
AppIO.position_subject2: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.FULL_NAME = 'SPOname_$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.deny_list: SELECT d.columns FROM DENYLIST d, PSP p, CANALI c, PA p2 WHERE d.FK_PSP = p.OBJ_ID AND d.FK_CANALE = c.OBJ_ID AND d.FK_PA = p2.OBJ_ID AND p.ID_PSP = '$activateIOPayment.idPSP' AND c.ID_CANALE = '$activateIOPayment.idChannel' AND p2.ID_DOMINIO = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode'
AppIO.pm_session: SELECT columns FROM PM_SESSION_DATA WHERE ID_SESSIONE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.pm_session_old: SELECT columns FROM PM_SESSION_DATA WHERE ID_SESSIONE = '$sessionToken'
AppIO.token_validity: SELECT TOKEN_VALID_FROM, TOKEN_VALID_TO FROM POSITION_ACTIVATE WHERE CREDITOR_REFERENCE_ID  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.creditorReferenceId' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.psp: SELECT columns FROM table_name where ID_PSP = '$sendPaymentOutcome.idPSP'
AppIO.payment_status_1: SELECT columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = $activateIOPayment.noticeNumber and s.PAYMENT_TOKEN= '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.info_pagamento: SELECT columns FROM CD_INFO_PAGAMENTO WHERE ID_SESSIONE='$sessionToken'
AppIO.rpt_stati: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv'

Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_carrello_napshot: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_rpt: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_carrello: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'
Mod1Mb.DB_INOLTRO_PAG_stati_rpt_snapshot: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.noticenumber' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInoltraEsitoPagamentoCarte.fiscalcode'

update_query.idempotency_update: UPDATE IDEMPOTENCY_CACHE SET VALID_TO = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE IDEMPOTENCY_KEY = '$sendPaymentOutcome.idempotencyKey' AND PSP_ID = '$sendPaymentOutcome.idPSP'
update_query.param_update: UPDATE table_name SET param = 'value' WHERE where_condition = 'valore'
update_query.param_update_in: UPDATE table_name SET param = 'value' WHERE where_condition IN valore
update_query.param_update_generic_where_condition: UPDATE table_name SET param WHERE where_condition
